fetch_news.title: Fetch News
fetch_news.description:
This tool fetches the latest cryptocurrency news articles for a specific token.
You can optionally specify a timestamp to get historical news, otherwise it uses the current time.
Returns articles in English with details like title, body, source, and publish time.

fetch_price.title: Fetch Price
fetch_price.description: Provides real-time cryptocurrency pricing with multi-exchange aggregation and historical comparisons

fetch_trading_signals.title: Fetch Trading Signals
fetch_trading_signals.description: Generates technical analysis signals using indicators like RSI, MACD, and Bollinger Bands

fetch_top_market_cap.title: Fetch Top Market Cap
fetch_top_market_cap.description: Tracks top cryptocurrencies by market capitalization with sector breakdowns

fetch_top_exchanges.title: Fetch Top Exchanges
fetch_top_exchanges.description: Ranks cryptocurrency exchanges by liquidity and trading volume with market pair analysis

fetch_top_volume.title: Fetch Top Volume
fetch_top_volume.description: Analyzes 24h trading volume trends across exchanges and currency pairs
